abstract: An option to use for higher quality motion estimation.
overview:
## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTMotionEstimationSessionCreate] takes a dictionary of creation options, `motionVectorProcessorSelectionOptions`. You can supply [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_UseMultiPassSearch] with `kCFBooleanTrue` to provide higher quality motion estimation. True-motion achieves higher quality by running the motion estimator in multiple passes. The default is `kCFBooleanFalse`.

# kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_UseMultiPassSearch

**Global Variable**

An option to use for higher quality motion estimation.

## Declaration

```swift
let kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_UseMultiPassSearch: CFString!
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTMotionEstimationSessionCreate] takes a dictionary of creation options, `motionVectorProcessorSelectionOptions`. You can supply [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_UseMultiPassSearch] with `kCFBooleanTrue` to provide higher quality motion estimation. True-motion achieves higher quality by running the motion estimator in multiple passes. The default is `kCFBooleanFalse`.
title: kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_UseMultiPassSearch
